title: Emerald Empress Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Telugu Legacy
materials: Finest Quality Emeralds (Panna Stone) - Vivid Green
Natural South Sea Pearls. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and finished with a rich Hyderabadi Polish.
features: A stunning, multi-strand Haaram featuring floral motifs meticulously studded with sparkling diamonds and vibrant emeralds. The design incorporates traditional 'Kasu' (coin) elements reimagined as diamond-studded flowerettes, connected by delicate gold links. The centerpiece is a grand emerald-studded pendant with intricate filigree work and delicate pearl drops. The necklace culminates in stylized lotus-shaped tops (Addigai) that add regal grandeur.
colors: accented by the deep green of the emeralds and the creamy luster of the pearls. The combination offers a rich
occasions: and other grand celebrations. A statement piece that adds unmatched elegance to any formal occasion.
description: This Emerald Empress Diamond Haaram is a testament to the artistry of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. It seamlessly blends tradition with timeless elegance, making it a cherished heirloom. The combination of high-quality diamonds, natural emeralds, and lustrous pearls represents prosperity and good fortune. Invest in a piece that transcends generations, a symbol of South Indian heritage and enduring style. Its substantial weight and exquisite design command attention and admiration.
